description: A girl with black hair and a distinct lock on the left side of her face that has the appearance of a katana edge who runs a dojo. She wields Nokogiri, a wooden sword also known as the King Sword. She attempts to train Shichika in kendo, an activity he is unskilled in due to his family`s inherent inability to wield a sword of any kind.
name: Kiguchi Zanki
